items.content_html: A lightweight spreadsheet app built with vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS. Features include multiple sheets, formulas, real-time updates, text formatting. Uses a graph data structure to manage formula dependencies and dynamic sheet management.

items.content_html: A lightweight and high-performance RESTful API built with Hono.js and Bun, designed to manage users, contacts, and addresses with relational data modeling. This project provides seamless CRUD operations, modern development practices, and is optimized for speed and efficiency. Perfect for learning or building scalable contact management systems.
